mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_hsy_partner_rules ( oem_profit, first_dealer_profit, second_dealer_profit, direct_recommend_profit, indirect_recommend_profit, baodan_profit, status )VALUES ( #{oemProfit}, #{firstDealerProfit}, #{secondDealerProfit}, #{directRecommendProfit}, #{indirectRecommendProfit}, #{baodanProfit}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_hsy_partner_rules SET oem_profit=#{oemProfit}, first_dealer_profit=#{firstDealerProfit}, second_dealer_profit=#{secondDealerProfit}, direct_recommend_profit=#{directRecommendProfit}, indirect_recommend_profit=#{indirectRecommendProfit}, baodan_profit=#{baodanProfit} where id=#{id}
